app.name: HelixML
app.one_liner: Private Agent Swarm with Spec Coding. Each agent gets their own desktop. Run Claude, Codex, Gemini and open models on a full private GenAI Stack.

screens.name: AI Agents Interface
screens.purpose: Provide an easy-to-use web UI for agent interaction, management, and monitoring of multi-step reasoning sessions with tool orchestration.

rust_commands.name: save_item
rust_commands.purpose: Persist agent configuration or session state to storage.

mvp_plan: week 1: Define helix.yaml schema for agent specification
week 1: Implement basic web UI for agent creation and interaction
week 1: Integrate support for at least one LLM provider (e.g., OpenAI)
week 1: Set up session-based architecture with pause/resume
acceptance_tests: User can create an agent via helix.yaml and interact with it through the web UI.
Agent sessions persist across browser refreshes and can be paused/resumed.
Platform correctly loads/unloads models based on demand using GPU scheduler.
